modName: Buffed Useless Enchantments -Buffed Unique and Quest Weapons
summary:
Buffed Useless Enchantments - Buffs Lunar Enchant, Hunters Prowess, ,Damage Stamina, ,Absorb Stamina, Damage Magicka, Absorb Magicka, Fear, Banish, Turn Undead & SilverSword/GreatSword
Buffed Unique and Quest Weapons - Buffs all Unique & Quest items
descriptionHtml:
BUE.esp
Buffs Lunar Enchant, Hunters Prowess, ,Damage Stamina, ,Absorb Stamina, Damage Magicka, Absorb Magicka, Fear, Banish, Turn Undead & SilverSword/GreatSword

BUENoCosts.esp
Buffs all the above enchantments as well as removing the charging cost of ALL weapon enchantments (no more charging with Soul Gems)

BUEWaepons.esp
Buffs all Unique & Quest items

BUEWaeponsNoCosts.esp
Buffs all Unique & Quest items as well as removing the charging cost of ALL weapon enchantments (no more charging with Soul Gems)

BUEWaeponsCombined.esp
Contains all the modifications of BUE.esp and BUEWaepons.esp

BUEWaeponsNoCostsCombined.esp
Contains all the modifications of BUENoCosts.esp and BUEWaeponsNoCosts.esp

Changed description
Especially effective against undead and werewolves dealing an additional <30> damage to them.

For reference
Shock\'s Magicka Damage is 		5
Buffed Magicka Damage to		20
Buffed Absorb Magicka to 		15

Frost\'s Stamina Damage is		10
Buffed Stamina Damage to 		30
Buffed Absorb Stamina to		15

Fire Damage				10
Buffed SilverSword\'s Damage to Undead	30 


Issues
*Only choose and download 1 file
*May conflict with other .esp files that modify the same enchantments and WILL conflict with any that change the same values.
*Silverweapons remain enchantable but not disenchantable although they will not say in the description any new enchantments added
*These mods do not change enchantment skill tree
*Silent moons provides a damage bonus at night while the moons are out (9pm - 5am, regardless of weather conditions) -Skyrim Wiki
*Will not affect non-unique magic items already in game
e.g. if you already have a \"Sword of stamina\" dealing 10 damage in your invetory before adding the esp it will still deal 10 after applying mod. Only new spawned weapons will be effected

Installation
Place which ever version of the BUE esp you chose along with the scripts folder (if you chose BUEWaepons, BUEWaeponsNoCost, BUEWaeponsCombined or BUEWaeponsNoCostCombined) into the Skyrim/Data folder
Click yes to any overwrite notifications

Requirements
None

Issues
*Only choose and download 1 file
*Silverweapons remain enchantable not disenchantable (but will not say their new enchantments)
*Wuuthrad remains enchantable (not disenchantable) but will not say its new enchantments)
*Woodsman\'s Friend is disenchantable for poison damage, nettlebane and angis bow are not
*trollsbane is disenchantable and appears as another fire damage description as to trolls
*Works with upgrade unique leveled spell mod \"Upgrade Leveled Items Spell\" by kryptopyr
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16090
*Works with temper mod \"Lost Art of the Blacksmith\" by Impulseve
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1020
*Files do not change enchantment skill tree
*Leveled items become more powerful
*Some basic unique weapons given enchantments may not show in description
*Silent moons provides a damage bonus at night while the moons are out (9pm - 5am, regardless of weather conditions) -Skyrim Wiki
